body_html: Will fix. Yes, cuda() has different semantics for modules and tensors, but it's because modules are much more heavyweight objects that maintain a lot of state. It could have been emphasised more it the docs though.

body: Will fix. Yes, `cuda()` has different semantics for modules and tensors, but it's because modules are much more heavyweight objects that maintain a lot of state. It could have been emphasised more it the docs though.
